metadata.title: C&C Weapons: Renegade Edition
metadata.author: Chrono Vortex
metadata.description:
This mod adds several weapons from the Command and Conquer universe to Multiverse. It is compatible with version 3.2+ of the Tiberian Sun Ship Pack. When used with the ships, this mod must be patched last, so the order should look something like this:
| Multiverse | ... | Tiberian Sun Ship Pack | C&C Weapons: Renegade Edition V ...
